marklogic.body: Well, nice try with the "there are more white people on welfare than blacks".Â Statistically it if by far more blacks.Â Lots of us white/black/brown are sick of "black" culture, BET, ho-nigga songs denigrating women and glorifying violence.Â Â I'm sure a race riotous summer is coming, so have fun.Â Burn down the cess pools of "black culture".Â Somehow I think it funny these idiots Always Burn down their own areas.Â Oh...and just try coming to my area.Â Good luck with that if you are coming to start trouble.
